title: [Silver and Garnet]
description: Lines of slender dwellings built edge-to-edge stretch along the cobbles, their cantilevered balconies providing shelter to pedestrians who stroll casually along beneath them.  Long wooden troughs fixed atop the railings overflow with plantlife.

Lines of slender dwellings built edge-to-edge stretch along the cobbles, their cantilevered balconies giving shade to pedestrians who stroll casually along beneath them.  Long wooden troughs fixed atop the railings overflow with infinite palettes of color.  Rainbow swathes of pink, blue, yellow, red, violet and cream flow in awnings over your head.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
